title: Chicken coconut curry
ingredients: ['cooking spray', '900g skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '800g chopped carrots', '640g chopped onion', '12 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons freshly grated root ginger', '800ml low salt chicken stock', '470ml light coconut milk', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '25g chopped fresh cilantro', '2 tablespoons lime juice']
